data.name: Critter Crops
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Now!



Take a moment to add Critter Crops to your Steam Wishlist! You can also Follow to receive updates about development and release dates, and it will help us reach more players.


Check out Mail Time!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1607240/Mail_Time/


About the Game




After being banished from her village for practicing magic, Sylvie had only one option left: A strange letter, inviting her to ‚ÄúMutter Island‚Äù and claim ownership of a mansion in the island's main town, Mur Mur. Upon arrival, she finds the place deserted, save for a bag of farming gear and a key to the inn mysteriously left for her. Shouldering the bag, Sylvie sets off to build a new life for herself on the spooky, yet strangely welcoming island.

Critter Crops is an isometric role-playing/management game, where you take control of Sylvie as she explores the island, raises crops of magical critters, and tries to uncover the secret of who invited her to the island and why.


  • Sylvie begins her adventure alone, but not for long.
  • Mutter Island supports a very special kind of farming: anything you plant grows into a magical creature!
  • These critter crops are not only cute, but the abilities they bring can help Sylvie traverse the wilds of Mutter Island.



  • Grow the young witch's magical talents over time and cultivate new critter crops to bring Mur Mur Town back to life.
  • With the bag of gear in hand, gather resources, restore the town, and who knows, maybe attract new settlers, who will accept Sylvie for who she is!



  • The letter that brought Sylvie to Mur Mur Town had to come from someone‚Ä¶ but who?
  • Explore, rebuild, and master Sylvie‚Äôs magical talents to unlock the sealed mansion and uncover the identity of her mysterious benefactor‚Ä¶



  • Meet visitors also looking for a new beginning as Sylvie explores the island.
  • Get to know each stranger and find out what gifts they might like: novels, herbs, craftable items, or critter crops of their own!
  • Convince these travelers to potentially make their stay a permanent one and learn more about their story, how they find themselves on Mutter Island, along with extra quests and objectives for Sylvie to accomplish.

data.short_description: Sylvie is a young witch, banished from home for her magic. A mysterious letter brings her to Mur Mur Town, an abandoned, spooky place where a bountiful life awaits her! Grow magical crops, unlock the mysteries of Mutter Island, and build a new home for an aspiring witch and her friends!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 3 series or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 /AMD Radeon R9 Fury or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 3 series or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 /AMD Radeon R9 Fury or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
